title: Apricot Scones
description: Low fat scones with apricots and whole wheat flour.

instructions.step2: Mix dry ingredients, cut butter in with pastry knife, add apricots and pecans
instructions.step3: Whisk eggs and buttermilk, add to dry ingredients and mix just until sticky
instructions.step4: Turn out dough onto lightly floured surface and knead lightly
instructions.step5: Pat dough into 9‚Äù circle on pan lightly sprayed with canola oil
instructions.step6: Cut into 12 wedges, cutting not quite all the way
instructions.step7: Sprinkle with granular sugar and cinnamon
instructions.step9: Cut with spatula and place individual scones on cooling rack

instructions.step2: Combine flour, oats, sugar, baking powder and soda, (nuts or apricots) in mixing bowl
instructions.step3: In a 1 cup measuring cup beat egg, then measure in oil, add vanilla and buttermilk, blend thoroughly
instructions.step4: Mash bananas in a separate bowl
instructions.step5: Add liquid mixture and bananas to dry ingredients, mixing just enough to combine, adding milk to proper consistency. Do not over mix, as you want small lumps
instructions.step6: Fold in pecans or apricots if desired
instructions.step7: Spray muffin pan with non-stick spray
instructions.step8: Spoon mixture into muffin pan, sprinkle coarse sugar on muffin tops

instructions.step2: Combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, and sugar in mixing bowl
instructions.step3: In another mixing bowl beat eggs, oil, and vanilla
instructions.step4: Mash bananas in a separate bowl
instructions.step5: Add liquid mixture and bananas to dry ingredients, mixing just enough to combine, adding milk to proper consistency. Do not over mix, as you want small lumps
instructions.step7: Spray 8 inch bread pan with non-stick spray
instructions.step9: Bake for 60-65 minutes, or until toothpick inserted near center comes out clean
instructions.step10: Cool in pan for 10 minutes, remove from pan and cool. For easier slicing wrap and store overnight.

title: Orange Pumpkin Bread
description: Orange pumpkin bread, made with a whole orange, raisins and pecans.

instructions.step2: Cut orange into wedges, remove seeds, process orange, peel and all in a food processor until finely chopped
instructions.step3: In a large bowl, cream oil, sugar until smooth
instructions.step4: Beat in eggs one at a time, then stir in pumpkin, water and orange
instructions.step5: In a separate bowl, mix the dry ingredients together
instructions.step6: Stir into batter until just until moistened
instructions.step8: Spray 9x5 inch loaf pan with non-stick spray (or use multiple smaller pans)
instructions.step10: Bake for 60 minutes, or until toothpick inserted near center comes out clean
instructions.step11: Cool in pan for 10 minutes, remove from pan and cool. For easier slicing wrap and store overnight.

notes: Parchment paper on the bottom helps the loaves come out clean. Smaller loaves require less time, 45 minutes or so.

title: Pumpkin Muffins
description: Whole wheat muffins with spiced pumpkin.

instructions.step2: Combine flour, oats, sugar, baking powder and soda in mixing bowl
instructions.step3: In a 1 cup measuring cup beat egg, then measure in oil, add vanilla and buttermilk, blend thoroughly
instructions.step4: Add liquid mixture and pumpkin to dry ingredients, mixing just enough to combine, adding milk to proper consistency. Do not over mix, as you want small lumps
instructions.step5: Fold in pecans and chocolate chips if desired
instructions.step6: Spray muffin pan with non-stick spray
instructions.step7: Spoon mixture into muffin pan, sprinkle coarse sugar on tops

title: Anadama Bread
description: Whole wheat bread with molasses and cornmeal, makes a 12 inch loaf.

item9.ingredient: yeast, bread machine or instant (1 1/2 at low altitude)

item10.ingredient: sunflower, pumpkin, flax seeds or cracked wheat (optional)

instructions.step1: Measure ingredients into bread machine pan, select basic cycle to raise but not cook. Additional white flour and rise time may be needed
instructions.step2: Remove from pan, roll to remove bubbles form into loaf and place into large bread pan coated with non-stick spray
instructions.step3: Cover and let rise for about an hour until dough has doubled in size
instructions.step4: Preheat oven to 350 degrees and bake bread for 35 minutes (rolls for 15-20 minutes)
instructions.step5: Remove from pan and place on a cooling rack

notes: Rolls or buns may be made using 60g portions of dough rolled in small amount of cornmeal for extra crunch.

title: Corn Bread
description: Crunchy cornmeal bread, muffins or sticks.

instructions.step1: Stir together flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, baking soda and salt
instructions.step2: Add eggs, milk, honey and oil
instructions.step3: Beat just till smooth, not over beat
instructions.step4: Spoon or pour into greased 9x9x2 pan, muffin or stick  pan
instructions.step5: Preheat oven to 425 degrees and bake bread for 12 minutes (muffins) or 20 minutes for bread
instructions.step6: Allow to cool enough to handle then remove from pan and place on a cooling rack

title: Cumin Rye Bread
description: Lighter rye bread with cumin, fennel or anise seeds, makes a 12 inch loaf.

item11.ingredient: yeast, bread machine or instant (1 1/4 at low altitude)

instructions.step1: Measure ingredients into bread machine pan, select basic cycle to raise but not cook. Additional white flour and rise time may be needed
instructions.step2: Remove from pan, roll to remove bubbles form into loaf and place into large bread pan coated with non-stick spray
instructions.step3: Cover and let rise for about an hour until dough has doubled in size
instructions.step4: Preheat oven to 350 degrees and bake bread for 35 minutes
instructions.step5: Remove from pan and place on a cooling rack

title: Pecan Sticky Buns
description: These upside down pecan sticky buns are the best.

instructions.step1: Measure bun ingredients into bread machine pan, select dough cycle
instructions.step2: Make pan glaze in a bowl by combining sugar, butter and corn syrup for glaze and spreading evenly in lightly greased 13x9 inch baking pan. Place pecan halves upside down in pan
instructions.step3: Make filling in a bowl by combining all filling ingredients except butter and set aside
instructions.step4: Remove dough to lightly floured board, cover with large bowl and let rest 10-15 minutes
instructions.step5: Divide dough in half, roll out each half to 20x7 inch rectangle. Spread half of the butter on each rectangle to within 1 cm of the edges
instructions.step6: Sprinkle half of the filling on each, roll up and pinch to seal seam, cut into 12 pieces and place in prepared baking pan
instructions.step7: Cover and let rise for about 45 minutes or until doubled in size
instructions.step8: Preheat oven to 375 degrees and bake for 25-35 minutes
instructions.step9: Remove from oven and immediately turn upside down on a serving platter. Allow to stand for 5 minutes before removing pan

title: Five Seed Rye Bread
description: Hearty rye bread with crunch from a variety of seeds, makes a 12 inch loaf.

item14.ingredient: yeast, bread machine or instant (1 1/2 at low altitude)

instructions.step1: Measure ingredients into bread machine pan, select basic cycle to raise but not cook. Additional white flour and rise time may be needed
instructions.step2: Remove from pan, roll to remove bubbles form into loaf and place into large bread pan coated with non-stick spray
instructions.step3: Cover and let rise for about an hour until dough has doubled in size
instructions.step4: Preheat oven to 350 degrees and bake bread for 35 minutes
instructions.step5: Remove from pan and place on a cooling rack

notes: Try making flat breads using 60g portions of dough pressed in olive oil and sesame seeds.

title: Apple Granola Bread
description: Naturally sweetened with apples and raisins, makes a 12 inch loaf.

item1.ingredient: unsweetened apple juice, or use 1/2 cup each apple and orange juice

item11.ingredient: yeast, bread machine or instant (1 1/2 at low altitude)

instructions.step1: Measure ingredients into bread machine pan, select basic cycle to raise but not cook. Additional white flour and rise time may be needed
instructions.step2: Remove from pan, roll to remove bubbles form into loaf and place into large bread pan coated with non-stick spray
instructions.step3: Cover and let rise for about an hour until dough has doubled in size
instructions.step4: Preheat oven to 350 degrees and bake bread for 35 minutes (rolls for 15-20 minutes)
instructions.step5: Remove from pan and place on a cooling rack

title: Chocolate Banana Loaf
description: Enjoy this sweet bread as toast, french toast or with peanut butter, makes a 12 inch loaf.

item13.ingredient: yeast, bread machine or instant (1 1/2 at low altitude)

instructions.step1: Measure all ingredients except chocolate chips into bread machine pan, select basic cycle to raise but not cook
instructions.step2: Select sweet cycle, and remember to add chocolate chips at the add ingredient cycle
instructions.step3: Remove from pan, roll to remove bubbles form into loaf and place into large bread pan coated with non-stick spray, or use a baking sheet
instructions.step4: Cover and let rise for about an hour until dough has doubled in size
instructions.step5: Preheat oven to 350 degrees and bake bread for 35 minutes
instructions.step6: Remove from pan and place on a cooling rack

title: Coffee Raisin Bread
description: Enjoy this rich dark and delicious bread with a cup of coffee, makes a 12 inch loaf.

item1.ingredient: coffee, freshly brewed at room temperature (or 1 T instant espresso)

item12.ingredient: yeast, bread machine or instant (1 1/2 at low altitude)

instructions.step1: Measure all ingredients except raisins into bread machine pan, select basic cycle to raise but not cook. Additional white flour and rise time may be needed
instructions.step2: Select sweet cycle, and remember to add raisins at the add ingredient cycle
instructions.step3: Remove from pan, roll to remove bubbles form into loaf and place into large bread pan coated with non-stick spray
instructions.step4: Cover and let rise for about an hour until dough has doubled in size
instructions.step5: Preheat oven to 350 degrees and bake bread for 35 minutes (rolls for 15-20 minutes)
instructions.step6: Remove from pan and place on a cooling rack

title: Crusty Italian Bread
description: Old world style bread to serve with any meal, makes 2 loaves.

item6.ingredient: yeast, bread machine or instant (1 1/4 at low altitude)

instructions.step1: Measure ingredients into bread machine pan, select basic cycle to raise but not cook. Additional white flour and rise time may be needed
instructions.step2: Remove from pan, divide the dough in half, and form each half into a 10 by 4 by 2 inch loaf slightly flattened on top
instructions.step3: Cover and let rise for about an hour until dough has doubled in size, add several diagonal cuts with a lame knife
instructions.step4: Preheat oven to 375 degrees and bake bread for 20-25 minutes until loaves are browning and sound hollow when tapped on the bottom
instructions.step5: Remove from pan, place on a cooling rack, and dust with flour

title: French Bread
description: French baguettes to serve with any meal, makes 2 loaves.

item6.ingredient: yeast, bread machine or instant (1 1/4 at low altitude)

instructions.step1: Measure ingredients into bread machine pan, select basic cycle to raise but not cook. Additional white flour and rise time may be needed
instructions.step2: Remove from pan, divide the dough in half, and form each half into a 10 by 4 by 2 inch loaf slightly flattened on top
instructions.step3: Cover and let rise for about an hour until dough has doubled in size, add several diagonal cuts with a lame knife
instructions.step4: Preheat oven to 425 degrees and bake bread for 20 minutes until loaves are browning and sound hollow when tapped on the bottom
instructions.step5: Remove from pan, place on a cooling rack, and dust with flour

title: Salsa Bread
description: Enjoy this savory bread with sandwiches, makes a 12 inch loaf.

item10.ingredient: yeast, bread machine or instant (1 1/4 at low altitude)

instructions.step1: Measure ingredients into bread machine pan, select basic cycle to raise but not cook. Additional white flour and rise time may be needed
instructions.step2: Remove from pan, roll to remove bubbles form into loaf and place into large bread pan coated with non-stick spray
instructions.step3: Cover and let rise for about an hour until dough has doubled in size
instructions.step4: Preheat oven to 350 degrees and bake bread for 35 minutes (rolls for 15-20 minutes)
instructions.step5: Remove from pan and place on a cooling rack

notes: Rolls or buns may be made using 60g portions of dough rolled in small amount of cornmeal for extra crunch.

title: Grilled Turkey Sandwich
description: Grilled turkey sandwich with a pickle, fruit and treat.

instructions.step1: Cut 2 slices of bread about 1/2 inches thick, spread mustard and any spicy additions (jerk, lime relish)
instructions.step2: Add 2oz of lean organic turkey or other sandwich meat
instructions.step3: Heat panini press or electric skillet to 325 degrees, use about 1/2 tsp of olive oil on each side
instructions.step4: Grill until browned as you like, flipping once or twice to get it just right
instructions.step5: Serve with a pickle, fruit and a treat
